de.jcommandlineparser
Class StringOption

java.lang.Object
  de.jcommandlineparser.AbstractOption<java.lang.String>
      de.jcommandlineparser.StringOption

public class StringOption
extends AbstractOption<java.lang.String>

StringOption represents an program option of type string.

--i=hello
would be such a string program option.

Author:
bananenkasper
See Also:
KeyArgument, ValueArgument

Method Detail

parse

public boolean parse(de.jcommandlineparser.KeyArgument arg)
Description copied from class: AbstractOption
Parse values from given KeyArgument.
For instance, in case of IntegerOption it will try to retrieve a Integer instance from every value retrieved from given key.

Returns:
true, if parsing was successful. False otherwise.
